title: Iridium Gray Wool Rich Pants
story_description:
Story Make a statement with these Iridium Gray Wool Rich Pants. Featuring a solid gray pattern,
these pants are both stylish and versatile. The slanted side pockets add a touch of practicality,
while the flat front offers a sleek and streamlined look. Whether dressed up or down, these pants
are sure to turn heads and elevate any outfit.

title: Cordovan Red Wool Rich Pant
story_description:
Story Step up your style game with this stunning Cordovan Red Wool Rich Bandhgala Designer Pant.
Crafted using wool rich fabric and designed to perfection, this bandhgala Pant is ideal for weddings
and other premium occasions. The belt closure with four flap pockets adds a touch of elegance to the
overall design, while the collar and sleek silhouette give a contemporary twist to this classic
ethnic outfit. Stand out from the crowd and make a statement with this trendy bandhgala Pant.
description:
Step up your style game with this stunning Cordovan Red Wool Rich Bandhgala Designer Pant. Crafted
using wool rich fabric and designed to perfection, this bandhgala Pant is ideal for weddings and
other premium occasions. The belt closure with four flap pockets adds a touch of elegance to the
overall design, while the collar and sleek silhouette give a contemporary twist to this classic
ethnic outfit. Stand out from the crowd and make a statement with this trendy bandhgala Pant.

title: Byzantium Wool Rich Pants
story_description:
Story Elevate your wardrobe with our latest must-have addition - solid pants! These pants are the
epitome of modern style and sophistication, with a wool rich fabric that feels as good as it looks.
The slanted side pockets are a stylish detail that not only adds a touch of edge, but also offers
practicality for carrying your essentials. The sleek and streamlined design of these pants make them
perfect for dressing up for a formal event or dressing down for a semi formal outing.

title: Feroda Gray Wool Rich Pants
story_description:
Story These Feroda Gray Pants are a stylish and comfortable piece of clothing. They feature a solid
gray pattern, creating a captivating look that is sure to turn heads. Made from wool-rich material,
these pants are lightweight, breathable, and durable, making them ideal for a variety of occasions,
from the formal boardroom to casual outings.

title: Mine Shaft Gray Wool Rich Designer Pant
story_description:
Story This Single Breasted Pant is a stylish and unique addition to any casual wardrobe. Made using
premium cotton fabric, this Pant features a striking white border design that is perfect for making
a statement. The single-breasted design adds a touch of sophistication, while the comfortable
regular fit ensures all-day comfort. Ideal for casual occasions and weddings this Pant is sure to
impress everyone around you.

title: Matterhorn Marron Wool Rich Pants
story_description:
Story Elevate your wardrobe with our latest must-have addition - solid wool rich pants! These pants
are the epitome of modern style and sophistication, with a luxurious wool rich fabric that feels as
good as it looks. The slanted side pockets are a stylish detail that not only adds a touch of edge,
but also offers practicality for carrying your essentials. The sleek and streamlined design of these
pants make them perfect for dressing up for a formal event or dressing down for a semi formal
outing. The premium quality of the wool ensures durability, warmth and comfort, making them a
timeless investment piece that you'll wear for years to come.

title: Porpoise Grey Subtle Sheen Wool Blend pant
story_description:
Story Renowned for its timeless designs and focus on quality, French Crown presents this classic
grey pant. Spun from virgin wool blend, this pant is presented in a grey colorway for a fuss-free
aesthetic and classic flat front finish.

title: Mardi Gras Black Wool Rich Pant
story_description:
Story This mardi gras black pant crafted impeccably from the House of French Crown is a sartorial
masterpiece. Tailored using wool-rich fabric, this pant is perfect for all your important meetings
and occasions. Team this pant with a cream shirt, tie, and oxford shoes for an impressive look.

from a blend of high-quality wool, these pants are durable and soft to the touch. The gray colour
adds a modern twist to a classic style, while the slanted side pockets add a timeless touch.

title: Copper Yellow Wool Rich Pant
story_description:
Story The power of a solid French Crown pants is immeasurable. Featuring a solid yellow pattern,
slanted side pockets, and flat front, these pants are all you need to give a sober touch to your
wardrobe. Pair these with a matching turtleneck pullover and oxford shoes for a fantastic look.
description:

title: Space Blue Subtle Sheen Traveler Trouser
story_description:
Story Revel in the thought that with this performance Trouser in hand, your main concern won’t be
the discomfort of your stuffy Trouser, but rather if the airplane has WiFi, or how close that baby
is going to be to your row. The specially woven terry rayon fabric makes this space blue Trouser
more wrinkle-resistant, stain-resistant, and gives it a slight stretch quality for increased
comfort, all without compromising breathability to keep you looking, feeling, and smelling your best
when you’re on the road.
description:

title: Wine Berry Wool Rich Pant
story_description:
Story Nothing can beat these solid wine berry pants from French Crown! These pants have the power
to uplift a simple outfit into something power-ball. The regular fit, expert tailoring, and slanted
side pockets will take you by surprise.

title: Juniper Green Subtle Sheen Trouser
story_description:
Story This juniper Trouser is a refreshing, serene addition to your gray and blue routine. Its
color is exceptionally rich thanks in part to its Rayon blend composition. Tack in the fact that
it's also lightweight and when woven together with a Trouser fabric staple like rayon, you’re left
with a naturally balanced weave that yields a high-quality, sweat-fighting Trouser perfect for warm
weather weddings and other formal occasions.
description:

lightweight and when woven together with a Trouser fabric staple like rayon, you’re left with a
naturally balanced weave that yields a high-quality, sweat-fighting Trouser perfect for warm weather
weddings and other formal occasions.

title: Hemlock Brown Plaid Pant
story_description:
Story Dress sharp while preparing for corporate battles with these outstanding plaid checkered
pants from French Crown. Cut in a regular fit silhouette from comfortable and premium wool rich
fabric for a warm feel, these pants are a must-have in your closet. Wear these with a matching
shirt, formal jacket, matching tie, and oxford shoes to complete the ensemble.

are the epitome of modern style and sophistication, with a luxurious wool rich fabric that feels as
good as it looks. The slanted side pockets are a stylish detail that not only adds a touch of edge,

pants make them perfect for dressing up for a formal event or dressing down for a semi formal

French Crown. Tailored with premium wool-rich fabric, this pant features checkered pattern and is a
perfect pick for any premium occasion.

title: Thunder Brown Subtle Checkered Woolrich Pant
story_description:
Story Get everyone talking everywhere you go wearing this Wool-rich pant. Style it for a formal
dinner or a dinner party and draw attention to your uniqueness. The stunning look of this pant lends
it a sophisticated touch, making it versatile and effortless to dress.

title: Gravel Gray Wool Rich Pants
story_description:
Story These Gravel Gray Pants are a stylish and comfortable piece of clothing. They feature a solid
gray pattern, creating a captivating look that is sure to turn heads. Made from wool-rich material,
these pants are lightweight, breathable, and durable, making them ideal for a variety of occasions,
from the formal boardroom to casual outings.

title: Royal Blue Wool-rich Pant
story_description:
Story Our incredibly smart charade pant is appropriate for the workplace or events, ensuring
comfort for long hours so you can stay on top of your game. Its normal fit allows for plenty of
mobility while maintaining a sleek profile for a timelessly tailored style.
